import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import '../css/CreatePost.css' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' export default function CreatePost() { // InitialState const InitialState = { title:'', description:'', picture:'', username:'', categories:'', createdDate:new Date() } const [postData , setPostData] = useState(InitialState) const [file , setFile] = useState('') const location = useLocation() useEffect(()=>{ const getImage = (file)=>{ if(file){ const data = new FormData() data.append("name" , file.name) data.append("file" , file) postData.picture = '' } } getImage() postData.categories = location.search?.split } , []) const handleOnChange = (e)=>{ console.log({...postData , [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) setPostData({...postData , [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const imageUrl = 'https://images.unsplash.com/uploads/141103282695035fa1380/95cdfeef?auto=format&fit=crop&q=80&w=2030&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D' return ( <>
{/* ---------------------------------------------Upload Button------------------------------------------------- */}
) }
